TopicTitle: Game crashed right in the middle of me building my 700 part space station...

Articles.Content:
ok

but are you sure? check the "autosaved ship" in the list

Okay? Did it crash when you were building it in orbit, or the VAB.

If it crashed in Orbit, it saves every 10 minutes. In the VAB it saves every minute or two in the Autosaved Ship.

I don't build space stations in orbit, I build them fully in the VAB then use haxs to get them in orbit.

and it didn't auto save.

Well... guess you found a good reason to stop using hacks... not trying to talk you down or nothing, its a SP game play it your way, but if you did construct it in space you'd be fine. In the VAB... hit that save button as much as possible. I hit it after every major part that goes go.
Perhaps you should build stations in orbit instead. Less chance of...that...happening.

Game crashed right in the middle of me building my 700 part space station...
In the VAB it saves every minute or two in the Autosaved Ship.

It took you a minute to build a 700 part space station!?
Maybe the game crashed because 700 parts is too many parts??

700 part space station...

Well, there's your problem!
The game does not crash at 700 parts. I've hit 4,000 and still flew. Slideshow takeoff, maybe, but still a takeoff.

Umm... Ok have you sent the crash logs to the developers.

You were building it in the VAB it doesn't take forever to rebuild it...thats all I have to say.

Perhaps you should build stations in orbit instead. Less chance of...that...happening.

Or maybe you should just mind your own business and let him play the way he likes to play.
